titles.title: High Rise Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act of 2024
High Rise Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act of 2024
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to classify certain automatic fire sprinkler system retrofits as 15-year property for purposes of depreciation.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
High Rise Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act of 2024
This bill classifies any automatic fire sprinkler system retrofit property as 15-year property for purposes of accelerated depreciation using the straight line method. Such property is installed for use in residential property.
